raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Camira Sailing Adventure ===
Google Tag Manager (noscript)
End Google Tag Manager (noscript)
Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
A full-day, all-inclusive sailing experience around  The Whitsundays, visiting the iconic swirling sands of Hill Inlet and Whitsunday Island.
Sit back and enjoy the sea air on-board the largest sailing catamaran in The Whitsundays. With capped capacity numbers, you can stretch out and relax as Camira sails through the Whitsunday Islands, taking you to the region’s most iconic locations. Departing from Airlie Beach, Camira cruises past Whitsunday Island, passing Daydream, Hamilton and Hook islands en route.
Please be advised that a moderate level of fitness and agility is recommended for this experience, which includes bushwalking, snorkelling, and climbing in and out of tenders. High temperatures and humidity are possible, especially in the summer months.
*Please also note for any guests wanting to snorkel the fringing reef from Camira, you must have adequate swimming abilities as there are no flotation devices available.
Book from Port of Airlie
Book from Daydream Island
Camira Sailing Adventure Brochure
Scenic return sailing adventure through the Whitsundays to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet
Morning and afternoon tea
Snorkeling the fringing reef*
BBQ lunch, soft drinks and water
Guided walk to Hill Inlet and lookout (tidal dependent)*
Sunscreen, hat, sunglasses and protective clothing
Light jacket/sweater for a cool or windy day
The following prices are per person.
*Prices are dynamically updated based on demand.
Child (4 - 14)
Family (2 adults & 2 children)
Due to the length and activity during the day this cruise is unsuitable for infants.
Great Barrier Reef Environmental Management Charge (EMC)
Included in your cruise fare is a per head fee which goes to the Government. The money collected is used by the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority (GBRMPA) for the management and protection of the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park.
Coach Transfers to Port of Airlie
Prices are in AUD and per person. Please note a non refundable credit card surcharge fee of 1.42% (Mastercard & Visa), 1.1% (WeChat Pay), 2% (China Union Pay) or 1.54% (Alipay) applies to all bookings. This fee is not included if payment is made via POLi. Please note 12 hours of notice is required for coach transfers.
COACH TRANSFERS to Port of Airlie are available at an additional cost. Return times are when the vessel arrives back at island resort or mainland. NOTE: Changes may occur due to flight schedule changes and other factors. Where a Day Cruise is cancelled we will send notification to the contact details provided at the time of your booking. The itinerary is subject to prevailing weather and sea conditions including tides, wind, swell, sun and rain. The vessel's Master must at his discretion determine the most appropriate course to ensure acceptable levels of safety and comfort for passengers, crew and other vessels.
Camira Sailing Adventure Gallery
24 The Cove Road, Airlie Beach

=== TOUR START: Camira Sunset Sail ===
Google Tag Manager (noscript)
End Google Tag Manager (noscript)
Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Enjoy the spectacular views of Airlie Beach as you sail into the sunset, drink in hand, aboard our stunning sailing catamaran.
Your evening begins as the sun is still high and warm as you cruise into Pioneer Bay. Sit back, relax and enjoy the all-inclusive beverages and delicious food offerings. It’s the perfect way to wind down your day in paradise. As the sun dips down, the lights of Airlie Beach will spring to life, offering a beautiful outlook as you head back into the Port of Airlie.
Step off the boat and carry on your night into Airlie Beach.
Sunset sail from Port of Airlie to Pioneer Bay along the coastline and back
All drinks (beer, wine, cider, sparkling wine, soft drinks, and water)
Operating every Friday and Saturday evening from October until February
Book from Port of Airlie
Camira Sunset Sail Brochure
Child (4 - 14)
Family (2 adults & 2 children)
Please note, unfortunately, Camira Sunset Sail is not suitable for children under 4 years of age.

Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Australia's first underwater accommodation on the Great Barrier Reef
Spend a magical night in Australia’s first underwater accommodation and have a front row seat to the dazzling underwater world of the Great Barrier Reef. Be prepared for an intimate experience that will stay with you forever.
– or take a scenic
to see the famous Heart Reef (additional cost). Watch the sunset with a drink in hand before enjoying a starlit dinner on the pontoon. After dinner, watch the reef come to life through the floor to ceiling windows of your underwater accommodation. Enjoy an exclusive morning on the reef before heading home with memories that will stay with you forever.
Book from Port of Airlie
Book from Daydream Island
Book from Hamilton Island
Arrive at your unique accommodation via a scenic cruise through the Whitsundays
Two underwater rooms available (king double or twin single options)
Each room features premium bedding, glass-walled en suite and floor-to-ceiling views of the spectacular underwater world of the Great Barrier Reef
All meals including breakfast, morning and afternoon teas, lunch and dinner
All beverages including beer and wine (some beverages available at an additional cost)
Spectacular dining experience under the stars
Activities at the reef including a private
Optional activities (own expense):
Protective clothing, hat and sunscreen
Light jacket or sweater for cool or windy days
Cash / credit card for optional activities
Still have questions? See our Reefsuites FAQ page below.
To ensure your stay at Reefsuites is as comfortable as possible, we ask you fill out the medical disclosure form.
Children aged 6 and over are welcome when accompanied by a guardian, please note there are no child prices for Reefsleep/Reefsuite. Pricing is per person.

Where a Day Cruise is cancelled we will send a notification to the contact details provided at the time of your booking. Itinerary is subject to prevailing weather and sea conditions including tides, wind, swell, sun and rain. The vessel's Master must at his discretion determine the most appropriate course to ensure acceptable levels of safety and comfort for passengers, crew and other vessels. All tours from Port of Airlie will stop at Hamilton Island to drop off and collect guests.
Make the most of your time at the reef with these incredible optional activities.

Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Sleep under the stars and wake up on the Great Barrier Reef
Reefsleep is a two-day/one-night encounter like no other.  An intimate opportunity to sleep under the stars and experience the Great Barrier Reef after dark.
Cruise through the gorgeous Whitsunday Islands to Hardy Reef, here you have a choice of activities such as swimming,
guided tours. Pay a visit to the incredible
before you sit down to enjoy a delicious buffet lunch. As the day winds down, the pontoon and the reef are exclusively yours. Enjoy a sunset drink before your starlit dinner is served on deck. Slip under the covers – it’s just you, the ocean and a galaxy of stars. Enjoy an exclusive morning on the reef before heading home with memories that will last a lifetime.
Book from Port of Airlie
Book from Daydream Island
Book from Hamilton Island
Arrive at your unique accommodation on the Reefworld Pontoon via a scenic cruise through the Whitsunday Islands
Overnight accommodation in a double Reefbed under the stars
All-inclusive meals: 1 breakfast, 2 morning and 2 afternoon teas, 2 lunches and dinner under the stars
All-inclusive drinks: soft drink, beer and wine (premium beverages available at an additional cost)
A range of wet and dry activities on the Reefworld Pontoon with all snorkel gear provided
Optional activities (own expense):
Protective clothing, hat and sunscreen
Light jacket or sweater for cool or windy days
Cash/credit card optional activities (guided snorkelling safari and scuba diving)
Before you pack your bags for your Reefsleep experience, we need to get some additional details from you. Please complete the medical declaration and meal selection forms below, your details will be automatically sent to our Reservations team when you click ‘submit’.
Make the most of your day at the reef with these incredible optional activities.
Romance Package (2 guests)*

Google Tag Manager (noscript)
End Google Tag Manager (noscript)
Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Return scenic cruise through the Whitsunday Islands
Did you know in the Whitsundays there are two great southern migrations during the winter months? 

Not just our majestic Whales, but also, we gleefully welcome our southern nomad friends joining us to bask in the warm Whitsundays winter!
Scenic Whitsunday Islands Cruise
Sit back, relax and enjoy a leisurely and scenic cruise through the spectacular Whitsunday Islands, passing by Daydream Island, Hamilton Island Marina and Hamilton Island Airport.
Unlimited tea and coffee
Scenic cruise through the Whitsunday Islands, travelling by Daydream Island, Hamilton Island Marina and Hamilton Island Airport before returning to Port of Airlie
Snacks and light meals available for purchase at our cafe before departure or on board the vessel

Great Barrier Reef Adventures

Join the Travel Club
Great Barrier Reef Full Day Adventure
The turquoise waters of the Great Barrier Reef are breathtaking – but dip below the surface and another world will greet you. Teeming with bright tropical fish and more than 1,400 species of marine life and coral. Snorkel, swim, dive and explore - an encounter with this World Heritage-listed wonder is truly unforgettable.
Departing either Port of Airlie, Daydream or Hamilton Island, cruise through the gorgeous Whitsunday Islands to our permanently moored Reefworld pontoon, located 39 nautical miles from shore at Hardy Reef. Jump right in with a
and explore the reef, or if you’d prefer to stay dry, head to the
or take a guided
. Complete your Reefworld experience with a delicious buffet lunch and, as the day fades into sunset, you’ll head home with lifelong memories of one of the world’s natural wonders, the Great Barrier Reef.
Book from Port of Airlie
Book from Daydream Island
Book from Hamilton Island
Scenic return cruise through the Whitsunday Islands to the Outer Reef
4 hours at Hardy Reef
with all gear provided, including wetsuits and stinger suits
Morning tea, lunch and afternoon tea
Optional activities (own expense): guided
Protective clothing, hat and sunscreen
Light jacket or sweater for a cool or windy day
Credit card for optional activities (guided snorkelling safaris, scuba diving)

=== TOUR START: Ultimate Whitsundays Combo ===
Google Tag Manager (noscript)
End Google Tag Manager (noscript)
Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
The ultimate way to discover the best of The Whitsundays – explore the Great Barrier Reef on a full-day adventure and relax on one of Australia’s best beaches – Whitehaven Beach across two days!
Whitehaven Beach Morning or Afternoon Cruise
Once on the beach, you will experience a diverse range of beach activities including swimming, hiking, beach games and stand-up paddle boarding, or simply relax and enjoy this world-famous icon for up to two hours.
Generous morning or afternoon tea is provided
Snacks and a range of soft drinks, beer and wine are also available for purchase onboard
For more information and inclusions
Great Barrier Reef Adventure
The turquoise waters of the
are breathtaking – but dip below the surface and another world will greet you. Teeming with bright tropical fish and more than 1,400 species of marine life and coral. Snorkel, swim, dive and explore – an encounter with this World Heritage-listed wonder is truly unforgettable.
Cruise through the gorgeous Whitsunday Islands to our permanently moored Reefworld pontoon, located 39 nautical miles from shore at Hardy Reef. Jump right in with a snorkel and explore the reef, or if you’d prefer to stay dry, head to the underwater observatory or take a guided semi-submarine tour. Complete your Reefworld experience with a delicious buffet lunch and, as the day fades into sunset, you’ll head home with lifelong memories of one of the world’s natural wonders, the Great Barrier Reef.
Morning tea, lunch, and afternoon tea provided as well as free tea and coffee
Drinks and snacks can be purchased onboard
Protective clothing, light jacket or sweater for cool or windy days
Camera, hat and sunscreen
Credit card for drinks, snacks and optional upgrades
Tours can be used in any order.  Not to be used in conjunction with any other offer. Standard Cruise Whitsundays conditions apply.
Want to add more to your Great Barrier Reef Adventure?
Family (2 Adults & 2 Children)
Second Certified Scuba Dive
Guided Snorkel Safari (Adult)
Guided Snorkel Safari (Child)
Tours will be automatically booked on consecutive days. To amend the date of departure or to change to a different Whitehaven Beach half day departure, please contact Reservations on info@cruisewhitsundays.com or 07 4846 7000
If a tour is cancelled we will send a notification to the contact details provided at the time of your booking. The itinerary is subject to prevailing weather and sea conditions including tides, wind, swell, sun and rain. The vessel's Master, must at his discretion determine the most appropriate course to ensure acceptable levels of safety and comfort for passengers, crew and other vessels.

Google Tag Manager (noscript)

Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet Chill & Grill
Indulge in the ultimate Whitehaven Beach experience;  from exploring spectacular Hill Inlet, to swimming,  hiking and soaking up the sun. Explore the stunning white, silica sand of the world-famous Whitehaven Beach on this full-day excursion.
Please be advised that a moderate level of fitness and agility is recommended for this experience, which includes bushwalking, and climbing in and out of tenders. High temperatures and humidity are possible, especially in the summer months.
Book from Port of Airlie
Book from Daydream Island
Book from Hamilton Island
Scenic Cruise through the Whitsunday Islands, with a brief pick-up stop at Daydream Island and Hamilton Island to collect more guests.
Up to 6 hours on Whitehaven Beach
Guided walk to Hill Inlet and Lookout
Walk to Whitehaven Beach Lookout
An Aussie-style BBQ on the beach
Morning and afternoon tea
Dedicated host for the duration of the day
Swimwear and beach towel
Sunscreen, hat, sunglasses and protective clothing
Light jacket/sweater for a cool or windy day
Whitehaven Beach Brochure (Departing Airlie Beach and Daydream Island)
Whitehaven Beach Brochure (Departing Hamilton Island)

Child (4 - 14)
Due to the length and activity during the day this cruise is unsuitable for infants.

Included in your cruise fare is a per head fee which goes to the Government. The money collected is used by the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority (GBRMPA) for the management and protection of the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park.

=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach Morning or Afternoon Cruise ===
Google Tag Manager (noscript)

Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Whitehaven Beach Morning or Afternoon Cruise
From Port of Airlie, journey across the Whitsunday Passage and into this amazing tropical paradise – a scenic sequence of remote waterways and hidden bays. On the southern shores of Whitsunday Island, the largest of the 74 Whitsunday Islands, famous Whitehaven Beach is a regular on lists of ‘World’s Best Beaches’. Wander along the sand, hike the short Solway Circuit for some show-stopping views, or cool off in the gently lapping water before your return cruise.
*In the unlikely event of northerly winds, the vessel master will assess the beach conditions, and, if required, a safer alternate beach location may be visited.
Please note this tour does not visit Hill Inlet or the Hill Inlet Lookout. To visit these locations, please see the
Whitehaven Beach Full Day Chill & Grill
Book from Port of Airlie
Book from Daydream Island
Book from Hamilton Island
Scenic Cruise through the Whitsunday Islands, with a brief pick-up stop at Daydream Island and Hamilton Island to collect more guests.

Morning or afternoon tea
Access to the Southern Whitehaven Beach Lookout

Swimwear and beach towel

Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Whitehaven Beach & Hamilton Island Tour
Visit two of Australia’s best-loved destinations on a scenic Whitsundays cruise – Hamilton Island and Whitehaven Beach. Hamilton Island is a sophisticated, family-friendly resort, with excellent eating, drinking and shopping opportunities. Not far away on Whitsunday Island, glorious Whitehaven Beach is one Australia’s most beautiful stretches of sand.
From Port of Airlie, cruise across the Whitsunday Passage and into the Whitsunday Islands. On
, hop-on/hop-off shuttle buses take you past key attractions, scenic lookouts and holiday accommodation.

Google Tag Manager (noscript)

Whitehaven Beach & Hill Inlet
Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Take a day to explore Hamilton Island at your own pace – the ultimate way to experience the island’s natural beauty. Hike through the hills, browse the boutiques and galleries along Marina Village main street, or unwind by the pool or beach. Eating, drinking and shopping opportunities abound.
Hamilton Island Freestyle – it’s Hamilton Island, your way. Free activities include swimming at Catseye Beach or the main resort pool; hiking to Passage Peak, One Tree Hill or along the South-East Head Trail; and exploring on the island shuttle buses. Enjoy a pub style lunch at Marina Tavern. Other activities – perhaps a visit to meet the koalas WILD LIFE Hamilton Island, go-karting, jetboating or mini-golf – are also available (own expense).

Great Barrier Reef Adventures
Island Escape Day Cruises
Join the Travel Club
Discover the laidback vibe of the newly reopened Daydream Island – the perfect place for a relaxing getaway. Spend your time swimming, enjoying the scenic surroundings or meeting some Great Barrier Reef marine life at the spectacular Living Reef.
Start your day with a scenic cruise to Daydream Island from Port of Airlie. From here you can choose your own activities: relax by the pool and soak up the ocean views or discover over 100 species of marine life in the incredible Living Reef. A delicious two-course lunch awaits at Salti Restaurant & Bar.
